snippet: Television news lionized Mr. Hazare before realizing what he stood for, the author argues.
abstract: Television news lionized Mr. Hazare before realizing what he stood for, the author argues.
lead_paragraph: "Last week in Mumbai, an old man accepted defeat," Manu Joseph writes in the International Herald Tribune. What sounds like it might at first be an indictment of the Anna Hazare movement, though, is actually a dissection of the news media that transformed him into a movement.

headline.main: Was Anna Hazare a Media-Created Farce?
